typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TransformedCustomer
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtratedCustomer
TransformedCustomer, ExtratedCustomer join(TransformedCustomer@{Cliente ID} == ExtratedCustomer@{Cliente ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Cliente ID} = TransformedCustomer@{Cliente ID},
		Nombre,
		Apellido,
		Segmento,
		Pais,
		Ciudad,
		Estado,
		{Codigo Postal},
		Region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataToStore
DataToStore keyGenerate(output(Pk_Cliente as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCliente
SurrogateKeyCliente sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Cliente as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table DIM_cliente'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Cliente = Pk_Cliente,
		Cliente_ID = {Cliente ID},
		Nombre,
		Apellido,
		Segmento,
		Pais,
		Ciudad,
		Estado,
		Region,
		{Codigo Postal}
	)) ~> StoreDWHCustomer
